publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8087 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow, a City of Culture—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on being named in a report as the biggest cultural powerhouse in the UK outside of London; believes that Glasgow’s creative industry has gone from strength to strength since being named European Capital of Culture in 1990; further acknowledges that the city’s cultural sector now employs more than 5,000 people, and looks forward to the ongoing development of what it considers this vital sector in the city.
S3M-8087 Glasgow, a City of Culture (lodged on 7 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Linda Fabiani*
